column4: Can someone help me revert my graphics card settings back to the default settings?
Whenever I startup ubuntu, when it gets to the login screen, it's blank
I think it's due to a bad graphics card driver
Wols_: the laptop has an intergrated graphics card
did you ever determine what card it is? i was away helping another
type lspci in terminal and one line will say something like vga adapter
so what log do I need now?
is it displaying a long file?
i am pretty sure it should be /var/log/Xorg.0.log that is where mine is located
you will never type all that atleast not correctly.
